info.title: Billing
info.description: The Zoom Billing APIs allow developers with [master accounts](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/rest/master-account-apis/) (also known as "primary accounts") to get information about billing plans of their accounts and subaccounts.

get.summary: List sub accounts' billing invoice reports
get.description:
Use this API to list sub accounts' invoice reports. 

 This API can only be used by Master accounts that pay all billing charges of their associated Pro or higher sub accounts. Zoom only allows approved partners to use [Master account API](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/zoom-api/ma) and manage sub accounts' billing information. Email the partner programs team at [**partner-success@zoom.us**](mailto:partner-success@zoom.us) for more details. 

 **one** request to this API every **1 second**.
**Prerequisites:** 
* A Pro or a higher plan with the **Master account** option enabled. 
* The sub account **must** be a paid account whose billing charges are paid by its Master account.

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `billing:master`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `Heavy`

post.summary: Generate sub accounts' billing invoice reports
post.description:
Use this API to generate sub account invoice reports. 

 This API can only be used by master accounts that pay all billing charges of their associated Pro or higher sub accounts. Zoom only allows approved partners to use [Master account API](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/zoom-api/ma) and manage sub accounts' billing information. Email the partner programs team at [**partner-success@zoom.us**](mailto:partner-success@zoom.us) for more details. 

 **one** request to this API every **3 minutes**.
* This API has a daily limit of **100 requests per account**.
   
  **Prerequisites:** 
* A Pro or a higher plan with the **Master account** option enabled. 
* The sub account **must** be a paid account whose billing charges are paid by its Master account.

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `billing:master`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `Heavy`

end_date.description: End Date for the billing invoice report.

get.description:
Download a Zoom subaccounts' billing invoice reports. Maximum of **one** request to this API **per second**.
**Prerequisites:** 
* A Pro or a higher plan with the **Master account** option enabled. 
* The subaccount **must** be a paid account whose billing charges are paid by its Master account.

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `billing:master`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `billing:read:download_invoice_reports:master`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `HEAVY`

**HTTP Status Code:** `200`

Invoice report information will be returned in the response when the parameter `download`= `false`.

 * Processing   
 * Completed

get.description:
List subaccounts' upcoming renewal plans.
**Prerequisites:** 
* A Pro or a higher plan with the **Master account** option enabled. 
* The subaccount **must** be a paid account whose billing charges are paid by its Master account.

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `billing:master`,`account:master`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `billing:read:list_upcoming_renewal_accounts:master`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `MEDIUM`

parameters.name: interval
parameters.description: Valid date range. Value is 30, 60, or 90.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Page size. Value is less than 50.

parameters.name: next_page_token
parameters.description: Use the next page token to paginate through large result sets. A next page token returns whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. This token's expiration period is 15 minutes.

get.description:
Get a subaccount's [billing information](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/201363263-About-Billing).  

 Only master accounts can use this API. Zoom allows only [approved partners](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/master-account-apis) to use master APIs and manage subaccounts' billing information. Email the partner programs team at **partner-success@zoom.us** for more details.
* To get a master account's billing information, use the `billing:read:billing_information:admin` scope. Enter me as the value of the accountId path parameter.
* To get a subaccount's billing information, use the `billing:read:billing_information:master` scope. Enter the subaccount's actual account ID as the value of the accountId path parameter. 
 

**Prerequisites:**
* Pro or a higher paid account with master account option enabled.   
 



**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `billing:master`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `billing:read:billing_information:master`,`billing:read:billing_information:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `MEDIUM`

patch.description:
Update [billing information](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/201363263-About-Billing) of a sub account.  
   
 
This API can only be used by master accounts that pay all billing charges of their associated sub accounts. Zoom allows only [approved partners](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/master-account-apis) to use master APIs and manage sub accounts' billing information. Email the partner programs team at **partner-success@zoom.us** for more details.  
   
 

**Prerequisites:**
* Pro or a higher paid account with master account option enabled.   
 



**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `billing:master`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `billing:update:billing_information:master`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `HEAVY`

200.description: **HTTP Status Code:** `200` Update billing information success.

400.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `400`
Bad Request **Error Code:** `2100`
This sub account is on self pay mode.
Invalid country parameter: {country}.
Invalid state parameter: {state}.
**Error Code:** `300`
Your request was not accepted because "{field}" contains special character(s).
**Error Code:** `200`
Please subscribe a plan for this sub account first.

404.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `404`
Not Found **Error Code:** `2001`
Account does not exist: {subAccountId}.

429.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `429`
Too Many Requests. For more information, see [rate limits](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/rest/rate-limits/).

get.description:
List a Zoom account's [invoices](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/207276556-Viewing-your-invoice-history#h_6710542f-23cc-4059-9cc7-ff02bec7314e). To list a regular Zoom account's invoices or a master account's invoices, provide `me` as the value of the `accountId` path parameter. To list a subaccount's invoices, provide the subaccount's account ID in the `accountId` path parameter. **Prerequisites:*** Account must be enrolled in Pro or a higher plan.   **Additional Rate Limit:** You can make **one** API request per account(`accountId`) every **200** minutes until the daily limit is reached. This API has a daily limit of **100000** requests per account(`accountId`).

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `billing:master`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `billing:read:list_invoices:master`,`billing:read:list_invoices:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `HEAVY`

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Start date for the invoice query in `yyyy-mm-dd` format. The date range defined by the “from” and “to” parameters should not exceed one year. The range defined should fall within the past three years.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: End date for the invoice query in `yyyy-mm-dd` format

**HTTP Status Code:** `200`  
 
Account billing invoice information returned.

balance.description: The remaining balance of the invoice after all payments, adjustments, and refunds are applied.

due_date.description: The date by which the payment for this invoice is due.

invoice_date.description: The date when the invoice was generated.

status.description: Status of the invoice.

target_date.description: This date is used to determine which charges are to be billed. All charges that are to be billed on this date or prior will be included in the invoice.

get.description:
Get detailed information about a specific [invoice](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/207276556-Viewing-your-invoice-history#h_6710542f-23cc-4059-9cc7-ff02bec7314e).   
 To retrieve a regular Zoom account's invoice details or a master account's invoice details, provide `me` as the value of `accountId` path parameter. To list a sub account's invoice details, provide the account ID of the sub account in the `accountId` path parameter. 

**Prerequisites:**
* Account must be enrolled in Pro or a higher plan.   
 

**Additional Rate Limit:** You can make **one** API request every **thirty** minutes until the daily limit is reached. This API has a daily limit of **100** requests per **account**.

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `billing:master`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `billing:read:invoice_details:master`,`billing:read:invoice_details:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `HEAVY`

target_date.description: This date is used to determine which charges are to be billed. All charges that are to be billed on this date or prior will be included in the invoice.

get.description:
Download a Zoom account's [billed](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/201363263-About-Billing) invoice file, in PDF format. To get an account's invoice ID, use the **[List billing invoices](/docs/api/rest/reference/billing/ma/#operation/ListBillingInvoices)** API.

You may send **one** request to this API every 30 minutes until you reach the daily limit of 100 requests per account.
**Prerequisites:** 
* A Pro or a higher plan with the **Master account** option enabled. 
* The sub account must be a paid account whose billing charges are paid by its Master account.

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `billing:master`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `billing:read:download_invoice_file:master`

get.description:
Lets master accounts retrieve subaccounts' plan information.
* To get a master account's plan information, use the billing:read:plan_information:admin scope. Enter me as the value of the accountId path parameter.
* To get a subaccount's plan information, use the `billing:read:plan_information:master` scope. Enter the subaccount's actual account ID as the value of the accountId path parameter. 

**Prerequisite**: This API can only be used by master accounts that pay all billing charges of their associated Pro or higher subaccounts. 

Zoom only allows approved partners to use [master account APIs](docs/api/ma/) and manage subaccounts' billing information. Email the partner programs team at [partner-success@zoom.us](mailto:partner-success@zoom.us) for more details. 

 

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `billing:master`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `billing:read:plan_information:master`,`billing:read:plan_information:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `MEDIUM`

Too Many Requests. For more information, see [rate limits](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/rest/rate-limits/).

post.summary: Subscribe an account to a plan
post.description:
Lets master accounts subscribe to a Zoom plan's subaccount.  

**Prerequisites:** 
This API can only be used by master accounts that pay all billing charges of their associated Pro or higher subaccounts. 

 Zoom only allows [approved partners](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/rest/master-account-apis/) to use master account APIs and manage subaccounts' billing information. Email the partner programs team at [**partner-success@zoom.us**](mailto:partner-success@zoom.us) for more details.  
 
 **Note:** To subscribe to an add-on plan **after** subscribing to a base plan, use the [**Subscribe account to an additional plan**](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/rest/reference/zoom-api/ma#operation/accountPlanAddonCreate) API.

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `billing:master`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `billing:write:subscribe_plan:master`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `HEAVY`

apt.description: The billing contact's apartment or suite number.

zip.description: The billing contact's ZIP or postal code.

employee_count.description: The number of employees associated with the organization of this subaccount.

paid_period_start_date.description: The date when a plan's paid period starts on the account. `paid_period_start_date` and `service_effective_date` must be the same date and must be in future.

service_effective_date.description: The date when the plan became effective on the account.

deal_registration_id.description: If the carrier account has a valid `deal_registration_id` it can use the deal registration discount. Otherwise, use the standard discount. Set in discount management on `nws-billing-op`.

post.summary: Subscribe subaccount to an additional plan
post.description:
As a master account, you can subscribe a subaccount to a Zoom add-on plan. 


Zoom only allows approved partners to use [master APIs](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/rest/master-account-apis/) and to manage billing information for subaccounts. Email the partner programs team at [**partner-success@zoom.us**](mailto:partner-success@zoom.us) for more details. 

 **Prerequisites:** 
* A Pro or a higher plan with the **Master account** option enabled. 
* The subaccount **must** be a paid account whose billing charges are paid by its master account.
* Only master accounts that pay all billing charges of their associated Pro or higher subaccounts can use this API.


**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `billing:master`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `billing:write:subscribe_additional_plans:master`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `HEAVY`

patch.description:
Use this API to [cancel a sub account's add-on plan](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/203634215-How-Do-I-Cancel-My-Subscription-). The cancellation does not provide refund for the current subscription. The service remains active for the current session.

This API can only be used by master accounts that pay all billing charges of their associated Pro or higher sub accounts. Zoom allows only [approved partners](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/master-account-apis) to use master APIs and manage sub accounts' subscriptions. Email the partner programs team at **partner-success@zoom.us** for more details.  
   
 

**Prerequisites:**  
 
* Pro or a higher plan with master account option enabled.
* The sub account must be a paid account.  
 


**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `billing:master`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `billing:update:cancel_additional_plans:master`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `HEAVY`

action.description:
The action to take for the sub account: 
* `cancel` — Cancel the add-on plan.

comment.description: Additional comments or notes about the add-on plan's cancellation.

reason.description:
The reason for the add-on plan's cancellation: 
* `1` — I am no longer working remote. 
* `2` — I had challenges getting the support I needed. 
* `3` — Features in the Basic Free Plan are sufficient. 
* `4` — The expense is too high. 
* `5` — I purchased the wrong product. 
* `6` — Paid purchase not needed right now, will repurchase in the future.

type.description:
The [type](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/other-references/plans/#additional-plans) of add-on plan. 

**Note:** To cancel a [Zoom Phone Base plan](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/other-references/plans/#zoom-phone-plans) and its [add-on plans](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/other-references/plans/#zoom-phone-add-on-calling-plans), pass the `phone_type` value for this field.

schema.description: Information about the canceled add-on plan.

200.description: **HTTP Status Code:** `200`   Cancel additional plans success.

400.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `400`
Bad Request **Error Code:** `2100`
* This sub account is on self-pay mode. * You cannot make cancellation requests for a Bundle plan. Contact the Zoom Support team for details. * Master accounts with Bulk licenses cannot provision, update, or cancel plans for sub accounts via APIs. Use the billing portal or contact Support.
**Error Code:** `200`
You cannot cancel an add-on plan for a sub account that is under a Free plan. * You cannot perform this action because you do not have a Zoom Phone subscription for this account. * Free trial and VIP accounts cannot cancel sub account add-on plans. Contact the Zoom Support team for details. * You do not have a "{planCode}" plan subscription.

hosts.description:
The account plan's number of hosts. 
* For a Pro plan, provide a value between `1` and `9`. 
* For a Business plan, provide a value between `10` and `49`. 
* For a Education plan, provide a value between `20` and `149`. 
* For a Free Trial plan, provide a value between `1` and `9999`. 

You **must** provide at least one positive integer value for the this field or the `increasing_hosts` field.

increasing_hosts.description:

You **must** provide at least one positive integer value for this field or the `hosts` field.

get.description:
Returns information on [plan usage](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/references/billing-plans/) for an account. This API supports standard and master accounts and subaccounts. 

* To get a standard account's plan usage, use the `account:read:admin` scope. Enter `me` as the value of the `accountId` path parameter. 
* To get a master account's plan usage, use the `billing:master` scope. Enter `me` as the value of the `accountId` path parameter. 
* To get a subaccount's plan usage, use use the `billing:master` scope. Enter the subaccount's actual account ID as the value of the `accountId` path parameter. 

**Prerequisite** 
* Master account on a paid Pro, Business or Enterprise plan.


**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `billing:master`,`account:master`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `billing:read:plan_usage:master`,`billing:read:plan_usage:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `HEAVY`
